name: Apples (Game Maker2)
description:
Jump on the platforms collecting apples in different levels, but be careful because the spikes in different places will prevent you from doing it.

This is my first game and it's pretty poor quality. Maybe I'll make more levels to play in the future.

To play the game, unpack the archive and run the Apples.exe file

a and d buttons or left and right arrows - walking

space - jump

You can also do a double jump
